channel.title: DMitry on Hi, I'm Kyle
channel.description: Recent content in DMitry on Hi, I'm Kyle

item.title: Information Gathering with DMitry
item.description: DMitry is a nice little utility built into Kali. It’s a basic and easy to use utility, but not great. Usage is straight forward. dmitry technicalagain.com DMitry is worth the effort to simply punch in the command line but don’t expect great information back. First, just about everyone is using a whois proxy to conceal their personal information. Second, DMitry relies on search engines to try to find subdomains and email addresses.
